reviewText:
This DVD contains 12 short episodes from the Max & Ruby cartoon. Amazon doesn't always do a good job on their DVD episode listings so here are the episodes that are included on this DVD:

1. Picture Perfect
2. Detective Ruby
3. Superbunny Saves the Cake
4. Max's Ride
5. Max on Guard
6. Ruby's Real Tea Party
7. The Bunny Who Cried Lobster
8. Max and the Three Bears
9. Little Ruby Hen
10. Ruby's Autograph
11. A Toy for Baby Huffington
12. Max's Big Dig

They love Max and Ruby. Great wholesome gift. Ruby is a bit bossy to her little brother Max but the kids love to watch this!! Max is always doing something to shake things up! The kids love Max! We will use it on long car rides.
I find it easier to burn fat and obtain muscle with the use of this product
Always a good adventure and very healthy, caring interaction between Ruby and Max.  My granddaughter love them!
Daughter loves this show! Great price!
My child loves it, we watch it almost every day, it's a pretty good length. It's not over too quick for her entertainment but ends soon enough for me
Perfect and just what I was looking for! It arrived right on time!!

We're a Max and Ruby house. I try to get her one special DVD a week and this one doesn't disappoint.  She calls this her share DVD.  If your child enjoys Max and Ruby, this is a great addition to their library.  We have a tv sleeper and try to watch quiet and calm dvd's that help her back to sleep if she wakes up scared. Max and Ruby (and Curious George) are our go to DVDs.

My 6 year old daughter loves Max & Ruby. I bought this video for her to watch with our friendship and sharing unit study. Max & Ruby is fun, I often wonder why the mom and dad are not present in the show. I love how Max always seems to help in the end even though he has been getting into trouble the entire time. Ruby is patient  with him and so kind. I believe this series teaches kids to be kind to one another! Great show and the price was awesome as well.
